projects.title: Foodiez
projects.description: A FullStack Website website for ordering food online. It links sellers and buyers in the food industry smoothly. Built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Snake game
projects.description: A web-based game created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It includes multiple levels, the ability to save high scores in local storage, and display them.

projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.description: A web app accurately determining age from birthdate. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for user convenience.
